price: [El Corán] fue revelado por Quien creó la Tierra y los altos cielos;
arabic: تَنزِيلٗا مِّمَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلۡعُلَى

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlan mimman khalaqa al-arḍa wal-samāwāti al-ʿulā
